revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: An essay on the nature and immutability of truth; in opposition to sophistry and scepticism. By James Beattie, Professor of Moral Philosophy and Logic in the Maris..."
revision.text: Possibly: An essay on the nature and immutability of truth; in opposition to sophistry and scepticism. By James Beattie, Professor of Moral Philosophy and Logic in the Marischal College and University of Aberdeen. (Edinburgh : printed for A. Kincaid & J. Bell. Sold, at London, by E. & C. Dilly, in the Poultry, MDCCLXX. [1770]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2405840~S1
